select
from YIMIAO_ORDERDETAIL t
AND t.COMPANY_ID_TB = #{companyIdTb} AND t.CONFIRM_STATE in (0,1,5)
AND t.ORDER_ID = #{orderId}
AND t.goods_id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{goodsId}), '%')
AND t.CONFIRM_STATE = #{confirmState}
AND t.ORDER_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orderName}), '%')
AND t.OUTLOOK like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{outlook}), '%')
AND (t.PRODUCT_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{productName}), '%') or t.PRODUCT_SPEL_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{productName}), '%'))
AND t.HOSPITAL_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{hospitalName}), '%')
AND t.COMPANY_NAME_SC like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{companyNameSc}), '%')
AND t.COMPANY_NAME_PS like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{companyNamePs}), '%')
AND t.SUBMIT_TIME >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
AND t.SUBMIT_TIME <= DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{endTime}, ' 23:59:59'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
AND t.COMP_RATIO < 1 and t.COMP_RATIO > 0
AND t.COMP_RATIO = 1
AND t.COMP_RATIO = 0
order by t.SUBMIT_TIME desc

AND t.SUBMIT_TIME <= DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{endTime}, ' 23:59:59'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
AND t.COMP_RATIO < 1 and m.COMP_RATIO > 0

select
FROM YIMIAO_ORDERDETAIL t
t.CONFIRM_STATE in (2,6,7)
AND t.HOSPITAL_ID = #{hospitalId}
AND t.ORDER_ID = #{orderId}
AND t.goods_id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{goodsId}), '%')
AND t.ORDER_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orderName}), '%')
AND ( t.PRODUCT_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{productName}), '%') or t.PRODUCT_SPEL_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{productName}), '%'))
AND t.GOODS_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{goodsName}), '%')
AND t.HOSPITAL_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{hospitalName}), '%')
AND t.OUTLOOK like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{outlook}), '%')
AND t.COMPANY_NAME_SC like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{companyNameSc}), '%')
AND t.COMPANY_NAME_PS like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{companyNamePs}), '%')
AND t.CONFIRM_STATE = #{confirmState}
AND t.SUBMIT_TIME >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
AND t.SUBMIT_TIME <= DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{endTime}, ' 23:59:59'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
AND t.COMP_RATIO < 1 and t.COMP_RATIO > 0

select tb1.product_name, tb1.purchaseCount, tb1.purchaseAmount, tb1.wcountOne, tb1.wamountOne, tb1.cratioOne, tb2.wcountTwo, tb2.wamountTwo, tb2.retArrCount, tb2.retArrAmount, tb2.cratioTwo from ( select t.product_name, sum(t.purchase_count) purchaseCount, sum(t.purchase_amount) purchaseAmount, sum(t.total_warehouse_count) wcountOne, sum(t.total_warehouse_amount) wamountOne, avg(t.comp_ratio) cratioOne from yimiao_orderdetail t,std_hospital s
t.hospital_id = s.hospital_id(+) and t.IS_USING = 1
AND t.PRODUCT_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{productName}), '%')
AND t.hospital_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{hospitalName}), '%')
AND s.AREA_ID like CONCAT(#{areaId}, '%')
AND t.SUBMIT_TIME >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
AND t.SUBMIT_TIME <= DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{endTime}, ' 23:59:59'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
group by t.product_name) tb1 FULL OUTER JOIN ( select c.product_name,sum(c.purchase_count) wcountTwo, sum(c.purchase_amount) wamountTwo, sum(c.total_return_count) retArrCount, sum(c.total_return_amount) retArrAmount, avg(c.comp_ratio) cratioTwo from yimiao_orderdetail_ret c,std_hospital s
c.hospital_id = s.hospital_id(+) and c.IS_USING = 1
AND c.PRODUCT_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{productName}), '%')
AND c.hospital_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{hospitalName}), '%')
AND s.AREA_ID like CONCAT(#{areaId}, '%')
AND c.SUBMIT_TIME >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
AND c.SUBMIT_TIME <= DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{endTime}, ' 23:59:59'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
group by c.product_name ) tb2 on tb1.product_name = tb2.product_name

select tb1.product_name, tb1.outlook, tb1.purchaseCount, tb1.purchaseAmount, tb1.wcountOne, tb1.wamountOne, tb1.cratioOne, tb2.wcountTwo, tb2.wamountTwo, tb2.retArrCount, tb2.retArrAmount, tb2.cratioTwo from ( select t.product_name, t.outlook, sum(t.purchase_count) purchaseCount, sum(t.purchase_amount) purchaseAmount, sum(t.total_warehouse_count) wcountOne, sum(t.total_warehouse_amount) wamountOne, avg(t.comp_ratio) cratioOne from yimiao_orderdetail t,std_hospital s
t.hospital_id = s.hospital_id(+) and t.IS_USING = 1
AND t.OUTLOOK like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{outlook}), '%')
AND t.PRODUCT_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{productName}), '%')
AND t.hospital_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{hospitalName}), '%')
AND s.AREA_ID like CONCAT( #{areaId}, '%')
AND t.SUBMIT_TIME >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
AND t.SUBMIT_TIME <= DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{endTime}, ' 23:59:59'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
GROUP BY t.product_name, t.outlook) tb1 FULL OUTER JOIN ( select c.product_name, c.outlook,sum(c.purchase_count) wcountTwo, sum(c.purchase_amount) wamountTwo, sum(c.total_return_count) retArrCount, sum(c.total_return_amount) retArrAmount, avg(c.comp_ratio) cratioTwo from yimiao_orderdetail_ret c,std_hospital s
c.hospital_id = s.hospital_id(+) and c.IS_USING = 1
AND c.OUTLOOK like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{outlook}), '%')
AND c.PRODUCT_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{productName}), '%')
AND c.hospital_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{hospitalName}), '%')
AND s.AREA_ID like CONCAT( #{areaId}, '%')
AND c.SUBMIT_TIME >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
AND c.SUBMIT_TIME <= DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{endTime}, ' 23:59:59'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
GROUP BY c.product_name, c.outlook ) tb2 on tb1.product_name = tb2.product_name and tb1.outlook = tb2.outlook

select tb1.goods_id, tb1.product_name, tb1.outlook, tb1.company_name_sc, tb1.purchase_price,tb1.unit, tb1.purchaseCount, tb1.purchaseAmount, tb1.wcountOne, tb1.wamountOne, tb1.cratioOne, tb2.wcountTwo, tb2.wamountTwo, tb2.retArrCount, tb2.retArrAmount, tb2.cratioTwo from ( select t.goods_id, t.product_name, t.outlook, t.company_name_sc, t.purchase_price,t.unit, sum(t.purchase_count) purchaseCount, sum(t.purchase_amount) purchaseAmount, sum(t.total_warehouse_count) wcountOne, sum(t.total_warehouse_amount) wamountOne, avg(t.comp_ratio) cratioOne from yimiao_orderdetail t,std_hospital s
t.hospital_id = s.hospital_id(+) and t.IS_USING = 1
AND t.COMPANY_NAME_SC like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{companyNameSc}), '%')
AND t.outlook like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{outlook}), '%')
AND t.goods_id = #{goodsId}
AND t.PRODUCT_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{productName}), '%')
AND t.hospital_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{hospitalName}), '%')
AND s.AREA_ID like CONCAT(#{areaId}, '%')
AND t.SUBMIT_TIME >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
AND t.SUBMIT_TIME <= DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{endTime}, ' 23:59:59'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
GROUP BY t.goods_id, t.product_name, t.outlook,t.company_name_sc, t.purchase_price,t.unit) tb1 FULL OUTER JOIN ( select c.goods_id, c.product_name, c.outlook, c.company_name_sc, c.purchase_price,c.unit,sum(c.purchase_count) wcountTwo, sum(c.purchase_amount) wamountTwo, sum(c.total_return_count) retArrCount, sum(c.total_return_amount) retArrAmount, avg(c.comp_ratio) cratioTwo from yimiao_orderdetail_ret c,std_hospital s
c.hospital_id = s.hospital_id(+) and c.IS_USING = 1
AND c.COMPANY_NAME_SC like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{companyNameSc}), '%')
AND c.outlook like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{outlook}), '%')
AND c.goods_id = #{goodsId}
AND c.PRODUCT_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{productName}), '%')
AND c.hospital_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{hospitalName}), '%')
AND s.AREA_ID like CONCAT( #{areaId}, '%')
AND c.SUBMIT_TIME >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
AND c.SUBMIT_TIME <= DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{endTime}, ' 23:59:59'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
GROUP BY c.goods_id, c.product_name, c.outlook,c.company_name_sc, c.purchase_price,c.unit ) tb2 on tb1.goods_id = tb2.goods_id and tb1.product_name = tb2.product_name and tb1.outlook = tb2.outlook and tb1.company_name_sc = tb2.company_name_sc and tb1.purchase_price = tb2.purchase_price and tb1.unit = tb2.unit

select t.PRODUCT_NAME "疫苗通用名", t.GOODS_NAME "疫苗名称", concat(case when t.OUTLOOK is null then "" else t.OUTLOOK end,' (',case when t.MEDICINEMODEL is null then "" else t.MEDICINEMODEL end,')') "制剂规格（申报剂型）", t.goods_id "疫苗编号", t.UNIT "最小制剂单位", t.order_name "订单名称", concat(case when t.COMPANY_NAME_SC is null then "" else t.COMPANY_NAME_SC end,' (',case when t.COMPANY_NAME_TB is null then "" else t.COMPANY_NAME_TB end,')') "生产企业（投标企业）", t.HOSPITAL_NAME "采购单位", t.SUBMIT_TIME "订单提交日期", t.COMPANY_NAME_PS "配送企业", t.PURCHASE_PRICE "最小制剂单位中标价格（元）", t.PURCHASE_COUNT "采购数量", t.PURCHASE_AMOUNT "采购金额", t.CONFIRM_STATE "订单执行状态", t.REFUSE_REASON "未供货原因", t.TOTAL_WAREHOUSE_COUNT "到货数量", t.TOTAL_WAREHOUSE_AMOUNT "到货金额", t.COMP_RATIO*100 "完成率（%）", t.ORDER_CUSTOM_INFO "要求备注" from ( SELECT * FROM YIMIAO_ORDERDETAIL m
m.CONFIRM_STATE IN (2, 6, 7)
AND m.HOSPITAL_ID = #{hospitalId}
AND m.COMPANY_ID_TB = #{companyIdTb}
AND m.ORDER_ID = #{orderId}
AND m.goods_id like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{goodsId}), '%')
AND m.ORDER_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{orderName}), '%')
AND (m.PRODUCT_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{productName}), '%') or m.PRODUCT_SPEL_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{productName}), '%'))
AND m.GOODS_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{goodsName}), '%')

nvl(sum(t.purchase_count), 0) purchaseCount, nvl(sum(t.purchase_amount), 0) purchaseAmount, nvl(sum(t.total_warehouse_count), 0) wcountOne, nvl(sum(t.total_warehouse_amount), 0) wamountOne, nvl(avg(t.comp_ratio), 0) cratioOne, nvl(sum(c.purchase_count), 0) wcountTwo, nvl(sum(c.purchase_amount), 0) wamountTwo, nvl(sum(c.total_return_count), 0) retArrCount, nvl(sum(c.total_return_amount), 0) retArrAmount, nvl(avg(c.comp_ratio), 0) cratioTwo, nvl(sum(d.cancle_amount), 0) cancleAmount from yimiao_orderdetail t left join std_hospital s on t.hospital_id = s.hospital_id left join yimiao_orderdetail_ret c on c.procurecatalog_id=t.procurecatalog_id and c.hospital_id=t.hospital_id left join (select sum(t.purchase_amount) cancle_amount, t.orderdetail_id, t.hospital_id from yimiao_orderdetail t where t.confirm_state = 2 group by t.hospital_id, t.orderdetail_id) d on d.hospital_id = t.hospital_id and t.orderdetail_id = d.orderdetail_id left join yimiao_purchase_order k on k.order_id=t.order_id

nvl(sum(t.purchase_count), 0) "采购数量", nvl(sum(t.purchase_amount), 0) "采购金额(元)", nvl(sum(t.total_warehouse_count), 0) "入库数量", nvl(sum(t.total_warehouse_amount), 0) "入库金额(元)", round(nvl(avg(t.comp_ratio), 0),2) "入库率", nvl(sum(c.purchase_count), 0) wcountTwo, nvl(sum(c.purchase_amount), 0) wamountTwo, nvl(sum(c.total_return_count), 0) "退货数量", nvl(sum(c.total_return_amount), 0) "退货金额(元)", round(nvl(avg(c.comp_ratio), 0),2) "退货率", nvl(sum(d.cancle_amount), 0) "撤废金额(元)" from yimiao_orderdetail t left join std_hospital s on t.hospital_id = s.hospital_id left join yimiao_orderdetail_ret c on c.procurecatalog_id=t.procurecatalog_id and c.hospital_id=t.hospital_id left join (select sum(t.purchase_amount) cancle_amount, t.hospital_id from yimiao_orderdetail t where t.confirm_state = 2 group by t.hospital_id) d on d.hospital_id = t.hospital_id left join yimiao_purchase_order k on k.order_id=t.order_id

SELECT t.GOODS_ID '疫苗编号', t.GOODS_NAME '产品名称', t.PRODUCT_NAME '疫苗通用名', t.UNIT '最小制剂单位', concat(case when t.OUTLOOK is null then "" else t.OUTLOOK end,' (',case when t.MEDICINEMODEL is null then "" else t.MEDICINEMODEL end,')') "制剂规格（申报剂型）", concat(case when t.COMPANY_NAME_SC is null then "" else t.COMPANY_NAME_SC end,' (',case when t.COMPANY_NAME_TB is null then "" else t.COMPANY_NAME_TB end,')') "生产企业（投标企业）", t.HOSPITAL_NAME '疾控中心', t.ORDER_NAME '订单名称', t.COMPANY_NAME_SC '生产企业', t.COMPANY_NAME_PS '配送企业', t.PURCHASE_PRICE '最小制剂单位中标价格（元）', sum(t.PURCHASE_AMOUNT) '采购金额(元)', sum(t.TOTAL_WAREHOUSE_AMOUNT) '入库金额(元)', FORMAT(avg(t.COMP_RATIO * 100),2) '入库率(%)', DATE_FORMAT(t.ADD_TIME, '%Y-%m') '月度' FROM yimiao_orderdetail t WHERE 1=1
AND t.ADD_TIME >= #{starttime}
AND t.ADD_TIME <= #{endtime}
AND t.HOSPITAL_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{hospName}), '%')
AND t.COMPANY_NAME_SC LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{prodCompName}), '%')
AND t.COMPANY_NAME_PS LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{delCompName}), '%')
AND t.GOODS_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{drugName}), '%')
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(t.ADD_TIME,'%Y-%m'),
t.HOSPITAL_ID
t.COMPANY_ID_SC
t.COMPANY_NAME_PS
t.GOODS_ID
ORDER BY t.ADD_TIME DESC
